original_query: SELECT MIN(Message_hasTag_Tag.MessageId) FROM Message_hasTag_Tag, Message_hasCreator_Person, Comment_replyOf_Message, Person_likes_Message WHERE Message_hasTag_Tag.MessageId = Message_hasCreator_Person.MessageId AND Comment_replyOf_Message.ParentMessageId = Message_hasTag_Tag.MessageId AND Person_likes_Message.MessageId = Message_hasTag_Tag.MessageId
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM Message_hasTag_Tag AS Message_hasTag_Tag
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM Comment_ReplyOf_Message AS Comment_ReplyOf_Message
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.MessageId=E3.ParentMessageId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM Message_hasCreator_Person AS Message_hasCreator_Person
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.MessageId=E2.MessageId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM Person_likes_Message AS Person_likes_Message
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(MessageId) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3E2.MessageId=E4.MessageId)
